name: Rogue
description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per Rogue level after 1st
description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

1.name: Expertise
1.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies, or one skill and your thieves' tools; your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check that uses them.

1.name: Sneak Attack
1.description: Once per turn, deal extra damage to one creature you hit if you have advantage on the attack roll or an ally is within 5 feet of the target.

1.name: Thieves' Cant
1.description: You know the secret rogues' language of thieves' cant and the signs used to convey hidden messages.

2.name: Cunning Action
2.description: You can take a bonus action each turn to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

3.name: Roguish Archetype
3.description: Choose a Roguish Archetype, which grants features at 3rd, 9th, 13th, and 17th levels.

3.name: Steady Aim
3.description: As a bonus action, give yourself advantage on your next attack roll if you haven't moved this turn; your speed becomes 0 until the end of the turn.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

5.name: Uncanny Dodge
5.description: Use your reaction to halve the damage of an attack you can see.

6.name: Expertise
6.description: Choose two more of your proficiencies to gain expertise.

7.name: Evasion
7.description: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity save for half damage, you take no damage on a success and half on a failure.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

9.name: Roguish Archetype Feature
9.description: Gain a feature from your Roguish Archetype.

11.name: Reliable Talent
11.description: Treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10 when making an ability check that uses your proficiency bonus.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement

14.name: Blindsense
14.description: If you are able to hear, you are aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of you.

15.name: Slippery Mind
15.description: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

17.name: Roguish Archetype Feature
17.description: Gain a feature from your Roguish Archetype.

18.name: Elusive
18.description: No attack roll has advantage against you while you aren't incapacitated.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Stroke of Luck
20.description: Turn a missed attack into a hit or a failed ability check into a 20 once per rest.
